body_html:
Just to confirm I have also found this, but had not yet put together a bug report.

I have tried it with both cuda 8 and 9, and torch 0.3.1 and the master branch as of a few days ago, compiled with the tricks mentioned in here:

#5136

OS is ubuntu 17.10, python 3.6.

body:
Just to confirm I have also found this, but had not yet put together a bug report.

I have tried it with both cuda 8 and 9, and torch 0.3.1 and the master branch as of a few days ago, compiled with the tricks mentioned in here:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5136

OS is ubuntu 17.10, python 3.6.
